wikipedia_page.main: Jane Bridge (born 4 February 1960) is a British judoka who won three European Championship gold medals and was the first Women's World Champion at under 48 kg. From 1993 to 1997 she coached the British Women's judo team and currently teaches in Performance Judo at the University of Bath.

link_mentions.page: List of events at Madison Square Garden
response: * November 1, 1980 -The first Women's World Judo Championship was held at the Gardens, Jane Bridge (UK) won the gold medal at under 48 kg
